column2: wonderful food and fast service. Only issue I had was at the door
column4: we did not have a reservation so I asked how long will it be and they said
column5: well we can't really tell you. I then asked how many people are in front of us and they said again it's our policy not to tell you. You may have to wait at least 2 hours
column7: we were about to walk out but decided to eat at the bar. After we ate
column8: they texted me that the table was ready...almost 2 hours later
